Text: Self-sovereign identity means that the identity of a person (or device or organization) is neither dependent on nor subjected to any other power or state. Learn more about the principles of #SSI. #DigitalIdentity #DecentralizedIdentity https://t.co/IJlMXP27ZD https://t.co/ucKYOQ52en
UrlTitle: ['How self-sovereign identity principles suit the modern world']
UrlDesc: ["As the decentralized digital identity model began to garner interest, it quickly developed the moniker 'self-sovereign identity.' Industry experts Drummond Reed and Alex Preukschat discussed the primary self-sovereign identity principles and their implications."]
